trait.name: Blood Frenzy
entries: The vlazok has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The vlazok has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The vlazok can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vlazok makes two Gore attacks.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition prone} condition.
